name: Filtered Product Search and Cart Addition
description: Find a specific pair of headphones within a price range and rating, then add them to the cart.
steps: Navigate to the homepage
Click on the search input field in the header
Type 'Sony wireless headphones' into the search field
Click the search button or press Enter
Locate the filter sidebar and set the maximum price to '$150'
Select the '4 Stars & Up' checkbox under the Customer Reviews filter
Click on the product image of the first item in the filtered results
Click the 'Add to Cart' button on the product details page

name: Specification Comparison and Selection
description: Compare two laptops and select the one with the better RAM specification.
steps: Navigate to the 'Laptops' category via the main navigation menu
Apply the 'Gaming' filter checkbox in the category sidebar
Click the 'Compare' checkbox on the first product in the list
Click the 'Compare' checkbox on the second product in the list
Click the 'Compare Selected' button in the sticky footer or header
Review the 'RAM' column in the comparison table for both items
Click the 'Add to Cart' button corresponding to the laptop with 16GB RAM or higher

name: Multi-item Cart and Promo Code Application
description: Add two specific office supply items to the cart and apply a valid discount code.
steps: Search for 'Ergonomic mouse' using the top search bar
Click the 'Add to Cart' button for the first search result
Search for 'Mechanical keyboard' using the top search bar
Filter the keyboard results by 'Blue' switch type
Click the 'Add to Cart' button for the first filtered keyboard result
Click the shopping cart icon in the top right corner
Type 'SAVE20' into the 'Promo Code' input field in the cart summary
Click the 'Apply' button next to the promo code field

name: Product Variant Selection and Wishlist
description: Navigate to a specific product, select custom variants, and add to wishlist.
steps: Navigate to the 'Smartwatches' section from the main menu
Sort the product list by 'Price: High to Low' using the dropdown
Click on the product name of the second item in the grid
Select 'Silver' from the 'Color' dropdown menu on the product page
Select '44mm' from the 'Size' variant options
Click the 'Add to Wishlist' heart icon located near the price
